mapper.select: select count(0) as icount from base_acluserrelrole a, base_aclrolebutton b, base_aclbutton c, base_aclmodule d, base_acluser e where d.code=#{modulecode} and c.code=#{buttoncode} and e.name=#{username} and ifnull(b.permission,0)=1 and a.role_id=b.role_id and b.button_id=c.id and d.id=c.module_id and e.id=a.user_id
